identifier: the complete backyard, inc.:fort worth, tx

reviews.text: Building your backyard shouldn’t come with delays, surprises, or disappearing crews. Too many people end up frustrated before the first splash ever happens. We do things differently. Our process is clear, our timelines are honest, and our designs are truly custom — created around how you live, not just how it looks on paper. From the first sketch to the final walkthrough, you’ll always know what’s happening and who’s making it happen. Ready for a better way to build? Let’s make your dream backya
Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"Absolutely wonderful staff, service, and prices!" "This company has restored my faith in contract type work!!" "From design to finish, we couldn’t be happier."

The Complete Back yard built us a great pool, they built us the best pool we have ever seen in a persons back yard.  It’s the level of a resort type pool. They did a wonderful job and if I was gonna build another pool tomorrow the complete back yard would be my first call. Response from the owner a year ago Mr. Miller, Wow! Thank you so much for the incredibly kind review. We're thrilled to hear that you love your new backyard oasis and that we exceeded your expectations. Our passion is building

The Complete Back Yard company put our pool/extended patio in last year and we could not be happier.   They are extremely professional and the job was completed ahead of scheduled.   They truly did complete our back yard and we are so thankful we decided to go with them. Response from the owner a year ago Melissa, your kind words and appreciation for our work truly uplift our entire team. We strive to create dream backyards for our clients, and knowing we exceeded your expectations and helped tu

Eric with the complete backyard was awesome to work with. The pool turned out great. We've enjoyed it immensely. Thank you so much to The Complete Backyard. We are happy we chose y'all to build our pool for us! Response from the owner a year ago Thank you so much for your kind words! We’re thrilled to hear that you’re enjoying your new pool and had a great experience working with Eric. It was our pleasure to help bring your vision to life.
